title: WTB T3 Turkey Red George Stone
author: ternst17

posts.post_title: WTB T3 Turkey Red George Stone
posts.post_content: Anybody have a T3 Turkey Red George Stone for sale? I’d need to sell a few things to make the purchase, but wanted to see if there are any out there first. Graded or raw is fine. Would also be interested in any other George Stone cards that are available. I have a T206 PSA 3 (would be open to upgrading), T205, E90-1, and M116.
